name: Occult Wizard
description:
Occult Wizard is a 3D puzzle game where you, the wizard, summons spirits and must place every spirit and yourself onto the set candles according to the symbols on the ground.

Input:

WASD/Arrow keys - moves everyone at the same time

Spacebar - Summons the spirits (up to 4 spirits).

Concept by Jake Hoerster

The graves, the candles, and the characters were found on the Unity Asset Store.

Note: The screenshots are not the final product. Video shows the final game.
